DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this trial is to investigate the effect of food and of gastric pH increase on the relative bioavailability of faldaprevir.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of Food Effect and Gastric ph Increase on the Bioavailability of Faldapravir
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy condition
